PageTitle: display mpls te cspf tedb area
FuncDef: The display mpls te cspf tedb area command displays CSPF-based SID information that meets the specified conditions.
CLIs: display mpls te cspf tedb area { <area-id> | <area-id-ipv4> }
display mpls te cspf tedb area { <area-id> | <area-id-ipv4> } igp-type isis
display mpls te cspf tedb area { <area-id> | <area-id-ipv4> } igp-type ospf

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an area ID.
For IS-IS, the value can be 1 or 2. For OSPF, the value ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

Specifies an area ID in IP address format.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te cspf tedb area 0
Id      Router-Id       IGP       Process-Id      Area             Link-Count
ID   DR-Router-ID    DR-Address      Area       DR-OSPF-Router-ID     Neighbors
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls te cspf tedb sid area command displays CSPF-based SID information that meets the specified conditions on the main control board.
